comment_body: Valiant of you to spread the good word. A change in formatting will make this much easier to read. Also got a little confusing with your things you -could- tell us. Being that you state you don’t tell us, when many of the sentences begin with “I tell you”. I look forward to seeing more from you!
Can't tell what happens afterwards because..???
wow I forgot how fucked up the formatting gets when you post from mobile - my bad man
